name: Vector Invaders in Space
description:
Vector Invaders from outer space are attacking the base, fire back with your fast lasers and shield defenses in this FREE retro space shooter.

Get your classic gaming fix with this retro inspired arcade game. Using the look of arcade classics on CRT cabinet screens.

Future updates: Planning to add other screen overlays just like those on the retro consoles. These overlays will enhance the look of the game if selected and simulate plastic overlays.

Shoot the ghostly invaders as they attack with lasers and bombs in our new fun spooky Halloween edition overlay!

Features:
★ Fun! Halloween Overlay (Optional) - Just like the Vec trex Console
★ Global High Score table - For Fun! Use your Twitter id in score table :)
★ Two control modes Buttons or Drag (tapping upper part of screen to fire)
★ CRT scanline effects
★ Dark Mode option
★ Bombs dropped by ships
★ Shots at various speeds / Mystery space ship bonus
★ Invaders advance faster on later levels
